DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find effect two different intervention muscle strength , ability produce muscle force quickly ( power ) , daily function , number step physical activity individual total knee replacement daily . The research hypotheses study follow : - For individual least 6 month post-total knee replacement , home-based high-velocity training exercise result significantly great improvement muscle strength power compare receive walking program . - For individual least 6 month post-total knee replacement , home base high-velocity training exercise result significantly great improvement daily function ( eg . sit stand , climb set stair ) receive walk program . - For individual least 6 month post-total knee replacement , home base high-velocity training exercise result significantly great improvement physical activity behavior ( eg . number step per day ) compare receive walking program .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Home-based Velocity Training Individuals With Total Knee Replacement
DOC.criteria: Men woman least 40 year age qualify primary unilateral total knee replacement ( TKR ) 6 18 month . low extremity prosthetic implant current TKR revision TKR plan revision diagnosis severe osteoarthritis uninvolved knee either hip joint recent low extremity injury significant pain increase weight bear functional performance diagnosis neurologic deficit decrease cognitive status might affect ability follow instruction significant cardiovascular and/or pulmonary disease limit function
